p: It has been speculated [ 3] that a number of the active compounds of S. virgaurea extracts (leiocarposide, polyphenolic acids, flavonoids, saponins) exert a synergistic activity in displaying the reported anti-inflammatory effects of the product [ 56, 93]. The antioxidant activity has been attributed to the polyphenolic compounds [ 3, 94, 95, 96], while flavonoids are thought to be responsible for the spasmolytic effects [ 3, 31, 97].
